sections.heading: of claims.A party asserting a claim to relief as an original claim, counterclaim, cross-claim, or third-party claim may join, either as independent or as alternate claims, as many claims, legal or equitable, as the party has against an opposing party
sections.text: SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 87, p. 407;Laws 1867, ยง 3,
